name: If It Fits, It Sits
description:
A cat simulation game where you run around the apartment and break things. The goal of the game is to get to the carboard box, but you will have to complete certain challenges to reach it.

Currently you can only break the plants. More features coming soon!

Controls:

LMB: move

RMB: break

Credits: 

Art & Programming by Viky Shen
